SQL.SQLRaw:
SELECT p.ref ref, t.nom AS customer, p.datep AS date, date_format( datep, '%d/%m/%y' ) as fecha, p.fk_statut AS idstatus, CASE p.fk_statut WHEN '0' THEN 'PropalStatusDraftShort' WHEN '1' THEN 'PropalStatusValidatedShort' WHEN '2' THEN 'PropalStatusSignedShort' WHEN '3' THEN 'PropalStatusNotSignedShort' WHEN '4' THEN 'PropalStatusBilledShort' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS status, p.total_ht base, p.tva vat, p.total AS total, t.rowid rowid, date_format( p.datep, '%m' ) AS month, date_format( p.datep, '%Y' ) AS year FROM llx_propal p INNER JOIN llx_societe t ON t.rowid = p.fk_soc LEFT JOIN llx_categorie_societe cats ON cats.fk_soc = t.rowid LEFT JOIN llx_categorie cat ON cat.rowid = cats.fk_categorie WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.entity=1 [AND p.ref LIKE '{Ref,false}' ] GROUP BY p.rowid, p.ref, t.nom, p.datep, p.fk_statut, p.total_ht, p.tva, p.total, t.rowid
ORDER BY date ASC

QueryColumn.Name: status
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE p.fk_statut WHEN '0' THEN 'PropalStatusDraftShort' WHEN '1' THEN 'PropalStatusValidatedShort' WHEN '2' THEN 'PropalStatusSignedShort' WHEN '3' THEN 'PropalStatusNotSignedShort' WHEN '4' THEN 'PropalStatusBilledShort' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS
